hero.intro: Over five years as a fullstack developer: solid experience in backend (APIs, services, databases) and frontend (web and mobile interfaces). I enjoy tackling the full cycle and solving end-to-end problems.

tagline.texto: I build interfaces and applications that scale, from frontend to backend and infrastructure.

trayectoria.texto: I've worked at consultancies, startups, and product companies: from frontend at Monoestereo and Ana GPT to fullstack at Daltum Systems and Bluepeople (Wallet module with React, React Native, NestJS, and .NET).

contacto.texto: Available for company hiring and project collaboration. If it aligns with what you're looking for, reach out via the form on the right or the email below.

monoestereo.sobreEmpresa: Creative agency: custom solutions, web and e-commerce development, design and B2B/B2C digital strategies.
monoestereo.descripcion: Development agency. Frontend development in multiple Node projects primarily using Vue.js and React. REST API consumption. Server deployments. Support in backend development areas.

anaGPT.sobreEmpresa: AI startup: sales assistant via WhatsApp, lead scoring and conversion flows.
anaGPT.descripcion: Fullstack development: frontend with Vue.js (interface design and implementation, GPT API integration for management and tracking flows) and serverless backend with Google Cloud Functions in TypeScript (Firebase, Firestore, Storage). Responsible for the complete application lifecycle.

daltum.sobreEmpresa: Technology and software provider: custom development, applications, IT staffing and cloud infrastructure (BaaS, IaaS).
daltum.descripcion: Fullstack development in Node.js and .NET projects. Integration and development of multiple REST APIs for projects such as shipping label generation, a human resources administration platform, an employee evaluation system, and cadastral data governance projects. Azure services usage. CI/CD implementation. Linux server administration and maintenance: application deployment, troubleshooting, environment configuration, and infrastructure management.

bluepeople.sobreEmpresa: Technology consultancy with project management software; assignment at Dolfintech (Barri Money Transfer, financial services and remittances).
bluepeople.descripcion: Fullstack development of the Wallet module: integration with Green Dot APIs for digital wallet functionality, web frontend development with React.js and mobile application with React Native, and backend with NestJS and .NET 9 (REST APIs, business logic, persistence). SQL and MongoDB database usage. Participation in design, implementation, and maintenance of wallet flows within the ecosystem.
